mapper.select: select R_NO as rNo,BookNO as bookNo,StuNO as stuNo,BorrowTime as borrowTime,ReturnTime as returnTime,StuName as stuName from returned where StuName like #{username} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(R_NO) from returned where StuName like #{username}
mapper.update: update returned set BookNO = #{bookNo},StuNO = #{stuNo},BorrowTime = #{borrowTime},ReturnTime = #{returnTime},StuName = #{stuName} where R_NO = #{rNo}
delete from returned where R_NO in (${value})
